refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
name
The name of the entry to look up
flags
The flags are specified by ORing the following values, or 0 for none of them.
ZIPARCHIVE::FL_NOCASE
ZIPARCHIVE::FL_NODIR

&reftitle.returnvalues;
